abstract: Dow Jones Industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index fall slightly, weighed down by declining energy stocks.
lead_paragraph: Chevron and Exxon Mobil were among the biggest decliners in the Dow Jones industrial average.

headline.main: Dow and S.&.P. Close Slightly Lower on Falling Energy Stocks
headline.print_headline: Dow and S.&.P. Close Slightly Lower on Falling Energy Stocks

snippet: Chevron and Exxon Mobil were among the biggest decliners in the Dow Jones industrial average.
